Description.Text: The 4-star Amber Balter hotel promises a fun and relaxing stay in the centre of Miedzyzdroje on Poland's Amber Coast. The hotel sits by the beautiful sandy beaches next to the Baltic Sea and surrounded by the forests and hills of Wolin National Park. The beautiful surroundings are ideal for walking and bike riding. The hotel is housed in a mid-rise building with a balcony studded facade. A wide range of facials and body treatments are on offer in the hotel's excellent spa and wellness centre, and the hotel features a sauna, indoor and outdoor pools and a 10-pin bowling alley. Other leisure opportunities include tennis, bike riding, golfing fishing and billiards. An extensive range of eating and drinking facilities, offering a rich choice of regional and international specialities, are located onsite. The elegant Chopin restaurant serves Polish cuisine accompanied with piano music and candlelight, while the Brasserie restaurant serves delicious meals to beautiful seaside backdrops. In addition to housing number of bars, the hotel has its own night club onsite. The Standard rooms are around 16sqm in size and feature comfortable decor and a private bathroom, complete with bathtub. They come with a balcony, from where guests can enjoy excellent views of the surrounding areas. Other amenities include a flat-screen television, hair dryer, mini bar and free Wi-Fi. The hotel offers a shuttle service to the nearby golf course.
